title: Cement in a car's lover's revenge?
subtitle: Is a man full of Cadillac supposed to belong to his wife's boyfriend in concrete?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The man who drives a cement blender for a neighborhood notices a strange car parked in his path and assumes the owner has an affair with his wife; as revenge fills the car with concrete, just to find out that the car was a gift from his wife.
